properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesosy ô, arotsahy,
Hivatravatra tokoa,
Ho aminay ny Fanahy
'Lay ranonorana soa.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Ry andon'aina (andon'aina)
Tondrahy izahay
Fa tena karakaina,
Velombelomy indray.
Amen, amen.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Midina ô, ry Fanahy,
Hanenika ny fonay,
Hanala ny ahiahy,
Hitari-dalana anay.
Ry andon'aina, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ny irinay ry Fanahy,
Ho vavolombelonao,
Ho mahatoky sy sahy
Hamabo fo ho Anao.
Ry andon'aina, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Amboary mba ho mpandova
Fiainana mandrakizay ;
Ka ny fonay ho voaova
Ho tena lapan'ny Ray.
